alert.note: Alert for Lexington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:17PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lexington County through 545 PM EDT... At 517 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Batesburg-Leesville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Red Bank, Gilbert, Summit, Cedar Grove Fire Station, South Shore Marina, Oswald Park, Fredonia, Shull Island, Bundrick Island, Siesta Cove Marina, Murray, Camp Kinard, Hollow Creek Public Park, Barr Lake and Red Bank Sports Complex. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 40 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central South Carolina.
